note: Graphic designer for an international boat club. Live in Florida with my wife, two dogs and a new kitten. Spend most of my free time writing, currently on a fantasy allegory serving as a critique of climate change, capitalism, religious nationalism, homophobia, racism, xenophobia, imperialism, fascism, disinformation or whatever right-wing insanity that pops up in the news. (So obviously, a LOT of inspiration available.)
